mapper.insert:
insert into Tb_Electric_Reading ()
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.meterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.dealDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.degreeDiff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.dealHour,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.readingEnd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.timeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.buildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.statusMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
